items.title: Metal Gear Solid Δ: Snake Eater hits Amazon all-time low (FREE Sneaking DLC Pack included)
items.summary:
We are now tracking the first chance to save on the physical PS5 copy of the new Metal Gear Solid Δ: Snake Eater Tactical Edition at $59.88 shipped at Amazon. This deal is also live at Walmart. Regularly $70, you’re looking at a nearly 15% price drop and a new Amazon all-time low. This is the Tactical Edition that includes the base game on the disc as well as a voucher for the regularly $15 Sneaking DLC Pack with 10 cosmetic items and the White Tuxedo. If you’re yet to pick up this frankly quite impressive remake of the MGS classic, you can now do so on Amazon with a nice little price drop – the first notable discount we have tracked there to date. 

more…

items.title: 9to5Toys Battlestation Weekly – Xbox handheld best price, up to $1,084 off RTX 50-series PCs and laptops, more
items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Battlestation Weekly – your go-to spot for the notable deals and latest releases in PC gaming at a glance every Saturday morning. This week we saw a bunch of notable markdowns headlined by the Xbox handhelds that landed at their best prices to date and stealing the spotlight right out of the gate. A good selection of RTX 50-series laptops and desktops from Lenovo, Alienware, and others also dropped to fresh lows, with up to $1,804 off. A batch of Logitech gaming mice and other peripherals hit their lowest prices this week, and to round things out, we even went hands-on with Razer’s new Kiyo V2 webcam. All that and more in this week’s Battlestation Weekly below.

more…

items.title: Electrified Weekly – early access Black Friday deals on new Aventon e-bikes, Exclusive EcoFlow station lows, more
items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Electrified Weekly – the best place to find all of this week’s best deals and new releases to electrify your life and protect Mother Nature. We’ve got another solid week of Green Deals for you here, with our EV coverage being led by the Early Access to Black Friday Aventon Sale that is seeing up to $400 discounts on legacy – but more importantly – new smart e-bikes, like the Pace 4 commuter at a new $1,599 low, the Aventure 3 all-terrain e-bike at $1,799, and the Level 3 commmuter at $1,699 – the latter two being first-ever discounts!

We also have Halloween Sales running through the rest of the month from EcoFlow, Anker SOLIX, and Jackery – with some notable exclusive deals like the EcoFlow DELTA Pro power station at a new $1,299 low, as well as the bundle of the DELTA 2 Max station with a FREE Solar Hat at a new $799 low. We also new releases, plenty of tool deals, and more waiting for you below.

more…

items.title: Aventon’s Level 3 smart commuter e-bike gets a first-time early Black Friday discount to $1,699 (Reg. $1,899)
items.summary:
As part of its Early Access to Black Friday Sale, which is offering new and first-time savings on Aventon’s latest 2025 e-bikes, we wanted to shine a spotlight on the new Level 3 Smart Commuter e-bike that is falling to $1,699 shipped, with both step-over and step-through frame options. It’s been on the market since February but hasn’t budged from its $1,899 MSRP, that is, until this new event launched a few days ago. Whereas we’ve seen a few of these newer generation e-bikes getting $100 first-time savings, this model is starting at a $200 markdown, setting the bar for future deals down the way.
